data.text: Pol nop anɨgɨl dam lel, ñɨn anep tɨgawup ak yek. Mɨnek mamɨd ak, bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl Ananayas, ne taun Sisaliya amnɨg, Juda bɨawl ogɨnap poŋɨd, bɨ takaw adɨk madɨk gɨl agñeb kɨli Tetulus ayɨp, Sisaliya ayaŋ amnɨlak. Amɨl, gapman bɨawl Peliks nop nɨŋɨd anɨb agɨlak, Pol nop kot gun agɨlak.

Anɨb agelak, gapman bɨawl Peliks ne Pol nop agek apek, bɨ takaw adɨk madɨk gɨl agñeb Tetulus, ne Pol nop puŋɨlɨl jɨmñɨl lɨl gapman bɨawl nop agñak, Bɨawl Peliks. Nad chɨnop kod mɨdɨl agek, chɨn mɨdtep yɨbɨl gɨpun agak. Penpen ma gɨpun, teplep mɨdobun agak. Gos nad teplep mɨdeb ak nɨŋɨd ge, tap tɨmel bɨlel golɨgup ak mɨñɨl ma mɨdeb agak.
Gɨpan anɨb ak, chɨn tap anɨb ak mɨdupsek nɨŋɨd nep tep yɨbɨl apun agak.
Nep pen takaw palawl ma agɨnɨgayn agak. Takaw wulep won agɨnɨgebin ak, tɨmud pak nɨgɨnɨmɨn agak.

Chɨn nopun, bɨ anɨb awl Pol, ne pel gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gup agak. Man akal akal amub okok, Juda kay kɨlop tɨg asɨk keke laknɨŋ, pelpel penpen gɨpal agak. Binɨb kɨli bɨ olap Nasalet nɨb anop gos lɨnepal okok, bɨawl kɨli nɨm anɨb ak agak.
24.6-8 Apo 21.28-30 Ne God agnɨgep kal awl chɨnop ak abe gek tɨmel gɨnɨmuŋ tek lek nɨm, nop dɨnok agak.
Takaw anɨb ak, bɨ anɨb ak nop agnɨgenɨgaban, ne ke nop kot gɨpun takaw jɨj ak agek nɨgɨnɨgaban agak.
Tetulus anɨb agek, bɨ Juda ap yelak okok, takaw nop ak kɨdek gɨl agɨlak, Nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agup agɨlak.

Gapman bɨawl ak ne ñɨn anep yomɨl Pol nop takaw agan agek, Pol agak, Yad nepin, nad sub kuŋay yɨbɨl man awl ak bɨawl tɨg asɨkep mɨdɨl chɨnop kod mɨdeban agak. Anɨb ak nɨm, yɨp tep gaknɨŋ nep takaw pen agebin agak.
24.11 Apo 21.17, 21.26, 24.17 Taynen agnepan jɨj ak, won anɨgɨl nɨgɨnɨgaban agak. Ñɨn olap, ned anep umɨgan ñɨn anɨb ak, yad God nop kɨgom yɨmɨl agnɨgin agɨl, Jelusalem amnɨnek agak.

Yad binɨb ogɨnap ayɨp, God agnɨgep kal awl kab wali kus gɨl yek mɨgan ak takaw penpen ma apun agak. Juda apnan gɨpal kal okok akaŋ, taun nab okok akaŋ, chɨbol tɨmel gep tek takaw ogɨnap ma agɨnek agak. Tap tɨmel anɨb ak ma gɨpin, bɨ anɨb okol kɨli nepal agak.
Yɨp mɨñɨl kot gebal ak, nad nɨgɨnɨgaban, takaw jɨj olap ma mɨdeb agak.

Pen nep takaw olap mɨseŋ agɨnɨgebin agak. Yɨp apal, Pol chɨn Juda ogɨnap gɨpun tek ma gup apal agak. Ne kanɨb anɨb pal ak kɨdek gup apal agak. Bɨawl kanɨb tep ne ameb apal ak kɨdek gup apal agak. Takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd apal agak. Apɨs based sɨkop God agnɨgelɨgɨpal anep, yad agnepin agak. Bɨ Mosis ayɨp bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok ayɨp, kɨli takaw ñu kɨl tɨkɨlak ak ma kelɨgɨpin agak.
24.15 Dan 12.2, Jon 5.28-29, Apo 23.6, 26.6-7, 28.20 Juda bɨ anɨb okok, kɨli binɨb tep okok sek binɨb tɨmel okok sek, mɨdupsek God kɨlop gek kumɨl tɨkjakɨnɨgabal agɨl nepal tek ak yad abe nepin agak.
24.16 Apo 23.1 Anɨb ak tek, gos yad pal ak teplep won ak nɨg yelɨgɨpin agak. God yɨp nɨŋɨd akaŋ, binɨb okok nɨŋɨd, gɨ tɨmel ma gup agɨnɨgel agɨl gos nepin, anɨb ak tek nɨgtep gɨl, mɨdtep gɨpin agak.
Pen yad sub ogɨnap man okok ajɨl, kɨdek binɨb yad tap ma mɨdeb okok kɨlop mani ñɨl, God nop tap sɨbog ñin agɨl, Jelusalem adɨkɨd ownek agak.24.17-18 Apo 21.17-28

Apɨl, God nop tap sɨbog ñin agɨl, God takaw ne pal ak kɨdek gɨl, wɨdɨn mɨdup ne adek sɨŋak teplep mɨdɨl, God agnɨgep kal awl kab wali kus gɨl yek ak mɨgan ayaŋ am yenek agak. Pen binɨb kuŋay ma dap yelak ak nɨm, penpen agep tek takaw ogɨnap ma agɨnek agak.
24.19 Apo 23.30, 25.16, 2 Ti 1.15 Pen Juda bɨ Esiya plopens nɨb okok, kɨli apɨl yepɨs agɨl yɨp dɨlak agak. Takaw kɨli mɨdobɨkop ak, awl apɨl takaw anɨb ak apɨlap agak.
Pen ma opal agak. Ak nɨm bɨ anɨb awl okol, bɨ Juda bɨawl takaw tɨg asɨkep okok ayɨp mɨdon yad takaw apin anɨb ak, tɨmel gen takaw jɨj nɨgɨlak ak agel nɨgɨnɨmɨn agak.

24.21 Apo 23.6, 28.20 Pen bɨawl takaw tɨg asɨkep okok ayɨp mɨdonok ñɨn ak, takaw nokom olap agen kɨli nɨgel mɨlɨk yownɨmuŋ tek lak agak. Takaw awl agɨl agɨnek, Yad binɨb kumɨl tɨkjakɨpal agɨl gos anep nɨgen, yɨp kot gebɨm agɨnek agak.

Pol anɨb agaknɨŋ, gapman bɨawl Peliks, ne binɨb Bɨawl kanɨb tep ne ameb apal ak kɨdek gup okok, gos kɨlop ak nɨgtep gak. Nɨgtep gak ak nɨm, kɨlop agak, Kɨdek bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep bɨawl yɨbɨl Lisiyas apek, takaw nop ak nɨŋɨd, takaw anɨb ak agɨnɨgayn agak.

24.23 Apo 27.3, 28.16, 28.30 Anɨb agɨl, ne bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep bɨawl anop agak, Pol nop nag lɨl, kod mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨn agak. Pen nop pɨsnep nag wos ma lɨnɨmɨn, ne tap ogɨnap ma yek, binɨb ne okok kɨlop agnɨgek, nop ap ñɨnɨgel agak.

Ñɨn ogɨnap amnak nɨŋɨd, kɨdek mɨnek olap, Peliks bin ne Dlusila ayɨp, Pol nop nɨgɨnɨg owlek. Bin Dlusila anɨb ak, ne Juda bin olap. Pen kɨli bel apɨl, nɨgɨmɨl Pol nop suk agek apek, Pol ne Klays Jisas nop gos lɨnopun takaw ak ag dad amɨlɨg agñak.

Anɨb agak, Gos chɨn adek ak ke ma nɨgɨnɨgun, God agup tek nɨŋɨd, mɨdtep gɨnɨgun agak. Mel ak, kot awl ak nɨgɨnɨgabun agak. Anɨb agek, gapman bɨawl Peliks takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd pɨlɨkɨl, Pol nop agak, Nad mɨñɨl am yenɨmɨn, kɨdek ñɨn olap nep suk agen ownɨmɨn agak.

Pen bɨawl anɨb ak, gos ne ke ak nɨŋɨd agak, Yad Pol nop suk agen apek nɨm, gos ne ke nɨŋɨd agɨnɨgab, Yad bɨawl nop kɨmɨgel mani ñɨl amnin agɨnɨgab agak. Gos anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, yɨp mani ñɨnɨgab agak. Pen gos anɨb ak nɨgak tek, Pol nop mɨnek mɨnek suk agek apek, takaw agelɨgɨpil.
Pen Pol kalabus nep yek, sub omɨŋal yɨn gaknɨŋ, bɨ Posiyus Pestus, ne Peliks tep nop ak dak. Peliks pen, Pol nop yokɨp wɨsɨb yokɨnɨm agɨl nɨgak ak pen, Juda binɨb yɨp yɨlɨk nɨgɨnɨgabal agɨl kelɨgak.
